title: Flyaway Katie
description: Whoosh! Strange and wonderful things happen when a little girl lets her creativity fly in this buoyant picture-book debut.It’s a gray, gray day when Katie decides to liven herself up. After all, the birds in the picture on her wall look a lot more exciting than she does, and much happier, too. So Katie puts on her brightest clothing, takes hold of a paintbrush, and lets her imagination take flight. But it’s more than her spirits that end up soaring!
author: Polly Dunbar
